name: Transactions avec carte
comment: Ce schéma part des cartes de paiement, et donne accès aux tickets, aux clients et aux établissements

EN.name: Card transactions
EN.comment: Use this extraction to list all items of all tickets where a card was used for payment. Form ticket lines one can access tickets and customers
